class.name: PhysicsShapeQueryResult2D
class.brief_description: Result of a 2D shape query in [PhysicsServer2D].
class.description: The result of a 2D shape query in [PhysicsServer2D]. See also [PhysicsShapeQueryParameters2D].

method.name: get_result_count
method.description: Returns the number of objects that intersected with the shape.

method.name: get_result_object
method.description: Returns the [Object] that intersected with the shape at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_result_object_id
method.description: Returns the instance ID of the [Object] that intersected with the shape at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_result_object_shape
method.description: Returns the child index of the object's [Shape2D] that intersected with the shape at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_result_rid
method.description: Returns the [RID] of the object that intersected with the shape at index [code]idx[/code].
